card_data.title: How many team members can I invite?
card_data.paragraph: You can invite up to 2 additional users on the Free plan. There is no limit on team members for the Premium plan.

card_data.title: What is the maximum file upload size?
card_data.paragraph: No more than 2GB. All files in your account must fit your allotted storage space.

card_data.title: How do I reset my password?
card_data.paragraph: Click “Forgot password” from the login page or “Change password” from your profile page. A reset link will be emailed to you.

card_data.title: Can I cancel my subscription?
card_data.paragraph: Yes! Send us a message and we’ll process your request no questions asked.

card_data.title: Do you provide additional support?
card_data.paragraph: Chat and email support is available 24/7. Phone lines are open during normal business hours.
